alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 5:09PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Marion County through 600 PM EDT... At 508 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Ocala Airport, or 7 miles northeast of Rainbow Lakes Estates, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rainbow Lakes Estates, Dunnellon and Romeo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
